cnName: 全民所有制、集体所有制（包括国有企业、事业法人、机关法人）等股权或控制权简单清晰的企业
enName: Enterprises with simple and clear equity or control rights such as national ownership, collective ownership (including state-owned enterprises, institutional legal persons, and agency legal persons)

enName: Corporate legal person enterprises such as equity or control structure is relatively simple and clear

cnName: 未涉及风险提示或负面报导
enName: No risk warnings or negative reports were involved

cnName: 3年内交易所等机构协查1次，可能涉及洗钱的账户
enName: Within 3 years, the exchange and other institutions cooperate to investigate once, possibly involving money laundering accounts

cnName: 3年内交易所等机构协查2次（及2次以上），可能涉及洗钱的账户
enName: In 3 years, the exchange and other institutions cooperate to investigate 2 times (or more), possibly involving money laundering accounts

cnName: 司法冻结账户以及其他可能涉及洗钱的风险提示或处置情形
enName: Judicial freezing of accounts and other risk representations or disposition that may involve money laundering

cnName: 7年内被有关部门因可能涉嫌洗钱犯罪等进行提示予以关注，或涉及负面新闻报导评论的。
enName: Within 7 years, he/she was prompted to pay attention by relevant departments due to possible suspicion of money laundering crimes, or was involved in negative news reports and comments.

cnName: 7年内被有关部门涉嫌洗钱犯罪调查、通报或涉及严重负面新闻报导等
enName: Within 7 years, he was investigated, reported or involved in serious negative news reports by relevant departments on the crime of money laundering

cnName: 正常非面对面交易客户
enName: Normal non - face trading clients

cnName: 1个月内，虚拟货币日均交易额>USD1W
enName: In 1 month, the average daily turnover of virtual currency >USD10k

cnName: 1个月内，虚拟货币日均交易额>USD10W
enName: In 1 month, the average daily turnover of virtual currency >USD100k

cnName: 1个月内，虚拟货币日均交易额>USD 50W
enName: In 1 month, the average daily turnover of virtual currency >USD500k

cnName: 1个月内，虚拟货币日均交易额>USD100W
enName: In 1 month, the average daily turnover of virtual currency was >USD1m

cnName: 3个月内同一IP和MAC地址发生5个（及以上）网上交易
enName: More than 5 times online transactions with the same IP and MAC address in 3 months

cnName: 一段时间内不涉及大额可疑交易预警
enName: Not involving large suspicious transactions for a period of time

cnName: 1年内涉及大额交易报告，但未涉及可疑交易控制措施
enName: Large transactions were reported within 1 year, but no suspicious transaction control measures were involved

cnName: 3年内涉及可疑交易控制措施，但未上报给监管可疑交易的
enName: Involving suspicious transaction control measures within 3 years, but not reported to the supervision of suspicious transactions

cnName: 5年内涉及一般可疑交易报告
enName: Report of general suspicious transactions within 5 years

cnName: 5年内涉及重点可疑交易报告
enName: Report of major suspicious transactions within 5 years

cnName: 无频繁大额提现、资金存取及其他交易异常行为
enName: No frequent large withdrawals, fund withdrawal and other abnormal trading behavior

cnName: 1个月内，客户资金存取总量/总交易量:5-10倍，且资金存取总量超过USD100万
enName: Within one month, the total amount of client's funds deposit and withdrawal/total trading volume :5-10 times, and the total amount of funds deposit and withdrawal exceeds USD1 million

cnName: 1个月内，客户资金总存取量/总交易量>=10倍，且资金存取总量超过USD100万
enName: Within one month, the total amount of customer funds access/total trading volume >=10 times, and the total amount of funds access exceeds usd1 million

cnName: 客户单次提现市值超过USD50万
enName: The customer's single withdrawal market value exceeds USD500,000

cnName: 1个月超过3次且每次金额超过USD50万
enName: More than three times a month and the amount of each time is more than USD500,000

cnName: 人工识别其他资金交易行为存在一定异常，无合理原因的
enName: Manually identifying other capital trading behaviors with certain abnormalities without reasonable justification

cnName: 3个月内，充值来源为可疑地址1次
enName: In the past 3 months, suspicious deposit 1 time

cnName: 3个月内，充值来源为可疑地址2次
enName: In the past 3 months, suspicious deposit 2 times

cnName: 3个月内，充值来源为可疑地址3次
enName: In the past 3 months, suspicious deposit 3 times

cnName: 3个月内，充值来源为可疑地址4次
enName: In the past 3 months, suspicious deposit 4 times

cnName: 3个月内，提现被拒绝1次
enName: In the past 3 months，suspicious withdrawal 1 time.

cnName: 3个月内，提现被拒绝2次
enName: In the past 3 months，suspicious withdrawal 2 times.

cnName: 3个月内，提现被拒绝3次
enName: In the past 3 months，suspicious withdrawal 3 times.

cnName: 3个月内，提现被拒绝4次
enName: In the past 3 months，suspicious withdrawal 4 times.
